name: SnakeChowder
description:
Summary:

Christmas is coming soon.

Chowder want to cook an  apple crumble,

so it go to the slime cave to find the materials.

This game is made for https://itch.io/jam/2-buttons-jam-2020

Very cool jam, thanks for Feldo again, and thanks for guys from Bahamut.

This is my second time join, really fun~~~

Featuring:
  • Eat more slime to make chowder body long.
  • If no fully eat then chowder can use special skill corresponding different slime.
  • Eat or not to eat, this is question.
Controls:
  • At first we can use Z and X, these two key.
  • And you can enter setting to change any keys what you like.

Tile map resources are used in Raou's excellent work!

https://raou.itch.io/dungeon-tileset-top-down-rpg

Thank you.
